website_summaries.verdict: A triple wireless charging pad that is capable of delivering 30 watts of power by allocating up to 10 watts to each device.
pros: This slim, Qi-certified wireless charger features a copper coil for better heat dissipation
The charging pad also features temperature control, surge protection, and short-circuit prevention to provide a safer, worry-free charging experience
cons: As is typical for wireless chargers, you may run into difficulties if you have a thicker smartphone case

customer_reviews.title: Room for everyone's phone.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this charger for a few weeks. It's so handy to just set my phone down while I'm working. My wife and kids can get a quick charge without moving mine. The quality appears great! I expect it will work perfect for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it does the job. Not very fast though.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. But it's not very fast at charging, and you have to be pretty cognizant of where you locate your device on it to ensure charging engages. The pluses are that it does charge watches (only tried Samsung) and wireless buds (again only tried Samsung). I don't think it's small enough to be easy for transportation. It's thin and light yes, but it's long. Design wise, I think it's sleek and stays out if the way. Which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless charger!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for Thanksgiving day so my family wouldn't use up all the outlets to charge their phones and it worked out great! It charged three phones at once!
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging time, sleek styling
customer_reviews.text: Very fast charging times. Capacity for 3 phones. Leather-like surface is soft and looks appealing on a desk. Not too thick but provides enough cushion to ensure phone is protected if casually dropped on the surface of the charger. Has added bonus of not being confined to a dedicated vertical position when not in use. In other words, you don't sacrifice desktop space. And if to you travel, this neatly slips into a backpack or carryon unlike most charging stations.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works.  Not a fast Charger.
customer_reviews.text: It works well, not a very fast charger though. One caveat, the phones must be placed properly. Crooked or Cocked and you could lose charge midway through the night. Happened a few times.
customer_reviews.author: D.De Stef

customer_reviews.title: picky, but fast
customer_reviews.text: it does work fine, but 4 stars because it stops charging after one full charge and doesnt start again so my phone has sometimes died in the middle of the night while sitting kmon this thing. that and its a tad picky about your positioning. but overall if you have lots of devices to charge in a hurry, this will get it done
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Great quick charging pad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to setup and use, as well as has a quality look and feel! It starts charging instantly and charges quickly also! very large charging pad, but not obtrusive. Does not take up a lot of space, and fits in nicely with decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye cords!
customer_reviews.text: You won’t be disappointed with this especially if you have a family with lots of iDevices. As a family of 5 all with iPhones and AirPods, cords all over the place was getting old. We put this in our kitchen to have a central charging space downstairs. It charges phones and AirPods quickly and leaves the counter free from cords.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great item... No more “lost” cables or boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. No more fighting over charging wires and boxes. This was purchased as a “home base” where our kids put their phones to charge overnight in our bedroom. It was almost a nightly occurrence that they would bring their phones and the search for a charging cable and/or box wild start. Not anymore. Now it’s, “drop and go.” Charger works great. All three phones are fully charged by the time they need them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is easy to use and is almost as fast in charging my phone as a corded option. It doesn't work for phones that have wallet cases around them or phones that have the knob holder on them. We tried 5 different cases on this charging device. A thin protective case works fine, thick cases do not work unless you take it out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Pixel phone
customer_reviews.text: This charger actually discharges the pixel phones it does not support Qi-wireless charging as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Charges quickly and easily ANY phone
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a great charger for our family! iPhone users and Samsung Galaxy phone have worked at the same time. No inserts required for any phone. These all charge even with thick protective cases on the phones. Guests have even set their phone on it and see the charge begin immediately. LOVE the convenience of this for charging three phones all at the same time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: 1earphone 2phone. Easy no messy cables.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Simple to use. Note 9 no fast charge but is ok its really meant for charge during my sleep. No messy cables beside my bed. Now it is hidden well on top and behind my head. Now even my wife stole my 1 "slot" for her phone haha. 3slots was a good call. Luckily didnt pick a 2slots wont be enough for todays household use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard ong

customer_reviews.title: Charging
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty cool that me and my roomies can charge our phones from the same pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned up the counter
customer_reviews.text: This allowed us to have just one charger permanently plugged in on our kitchen counter rather than have four separate chargers and plugs. This charges up to 3 phones at once and looks nice doing it
customer_reviews.author: jwindy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. Doesnt work very well. It takes lots of maneuvering to get it to start charging. Tried it without my case with same results. There are alot more charging pads that are better qaulity and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. & Ellany

customer_reviews.title: Charges everything except Galaxy Watch
customer_reviews.text: Charges an Iphone 8, Iphone 11 max pro, galaxy s8, galaxy note 9, note 10 plus, galaxy earbuds. But will not charge my galaxy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Not really responsive when phone is placed on the mat. Have to move the phone around to get connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.  Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice looking charger. I like the quality, it doesn't feel like a cheaply made product. Charges very well. I think it is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Michael Marseoni

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: The chaeger is really cool. It can charge 3 cellphones at the time. It looks nice and you can pack it wherever you want it. It slim so it fits in any backpack or laptop bag. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: A bust!
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t reliable so I stopped using it. Phone charging is inconsistent even when I get the confirmation sound indicating the device is properly seated on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Pamelita11

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: This was a great add to the house. Upgraded from a 2 port wireless 5w charger to this and wow. Faster charges and the extra spot allows for that extra device to charge.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer2003

customer_reviews.title: Only works for a short while
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about 2 weeks or so, then it stopped charging. We ordered a replacement. It also only worked for a few weeks. Also, when it was working, it was difficult to find the “sweet spot” to get things to charge. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice and very simple
customer_reviews.text: It's Light weight and the pad area is a nice size. The charging area could use built in small led lights or have the pad glow in the dark so far it's a keeper
customer_reviews.author: CW II Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do watches
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would charge my Apple watch and it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty charging
customer_reviews.text: It's good if you don't have a thick case for your phone like a otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This Wireless charging station was a holiday gift for my husband. It worked although some sounds in cases were not able to connect for wireless charging. This month it abruptly stopped working completely (after 6 months), and of course the return window has closed. Product support, help!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: So easy, no more broken, borrowed stolen cords
customer_reviews.text: Going to buy three more Work so well and are so handy for big family.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley FitzPatrick

customer_reviews.title: money well spend
customer_reviews.text: i love how it work on 3 at one i got this since i have galaxy s6 go to upgrade to galaxy s8 or s9 i can charge both and have space in case i even need for something money well spend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: It’s very simple to set up, it’s possible to take it on the go but I wouldn’t recommend it because of the size of it and charger but overall it’s a good product so far
customer_reviews.author: Simply Orange Juice

customer_reviews.title: To slow, doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have quick charge, it Is too slow and some times doesn't detect the mobile so doesn't charge. Only charges until 86% of the batery.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tejada Ito

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and was very reasonably priced. Easy to use and was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Sleek in appearance and works great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm every time, been using for a few weeks now without a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great, but pay attention to placement when placing item to charge
customer_reviews.text: You have to make sure that it’s perfectly on the charging spots or it won’t charge. Pay attention when you place it and it’s not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Product works. Plug it in. Set phones on it. It’s that simple. Charges two iPhones and a set of AirPods
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for price
customer_reviews.text: Solid charger for any wireless device. Fits well on my desk. It has 3 charging spots and with enough room for 3 devices including my AirPods. Its lightweight and the cord is very minimal. Make sure to center the phone on the pad or the charger will not pick it up for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is really good. Faux leather makes it durable and adds grip
customer_reviews.author: Meeko

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I like how it is very minimal and doesn't take up a lot of space on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. Put the plug together easy and just place the phone on top and it charges easy. And it has three spots for multiple phones. Works well with iPhones! My iPhone works on it. I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nashali N

customer_reviews.title: Wont Charge through Otter Box Defender Case.
customer_reviews.text: I have a el cheepo wireless charger I was given as a swag gift, it has no issues with the defender case.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It works but it overheats my phone which I don’t like also it charges somewhat slow and it doesn’t charge my Apple Watch wish I knew that before hand
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Product, does not last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this since we have multiple wirelessly charged phones in my home. It worked for a short while and then completely stopped charging on all three spots. This is so very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Zell

customer_reviews.title: Charger or stove?
customer_reviews.text: Heats up right away. Charger and phone both get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Booker

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK FOR PIXEL 3 or PIXEL 4
customer_reviews.text: 1. Does not charge Pixel3 or pixel 4 -- In fact if you leave your phone on this charger overnight and Check the next morning - the Battery status shows lower battery power. 2. Other chargers like Atomi are working good 3. NO LED Indicators
customer_reviews.author: SU

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my elder parents... they loved it for a week, but then it just stopped working. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tikigirl

customer_reviews.title: It works... but just barely
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this item again. Phone placement is extremely fussy & it took 48 hrs to fully charge an already half charged iPhone. It does work on my Pioneer portable digital player but charges just as slowly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great, Then just good.
customer_reviews.text: Great item Pro: Less wires for 3 phones Fast charge Slim/very Light weight Can be placed and works on not so flat surface Wire can be taken apart Some what convenient for travel Con: Not place & go. As in you won’t be able to place it on and leave. You’ll have to sit there and try to find a perfect spot to get the phone to charge. I have to keep moving my phone around to find that charge. At first it was fine but with in a month it just got lazy & wouldn’t charge on go.(maybe my item is defective) Either way it’s great, convenient, would recommend. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Athi

product_meta.title: 3x10W Wireless Charging Pad, ZealSound Qi-Certified Ultra-Slim Fast Triple Wireless Charger Station for Multiple 3 Devices & New Airpods Leather W/AC Adapter for All Qi Enabled Phones(Black)
feature_bullets: 【Powerful Fast Charge for Three Wireless Devices】 Charge 3 Qi-Enabled phones simultaneously and can charge the New AirPods; 10w/7.5w/5w three charge mode can achieve 30W output --Super fast charger station house for multiple devices.

【Certified Charge Safe】Qi FCC RoHS and CE Certificated with Exclusive Design Patent (Premium Leather ultra slim pad and premium copper coil makes the charge safer and has a better heat dissipation.). With our equipped 36W AC adapter, it achieves 30 minutes-80 minutes faster than other fast chargers on the market.

【Advanced Safety Protection】 Exclusive Multifunctional Intelligent Protect Technology provides temperature control, surge protection, short-circuit prevention, and more. 0.35in thickness design plus intelligent temperature control system ensure cooler but more efficient charging; Leather ultra slim pad and premium copper coil makes the charge safer and has a good heat dissipation.

【Universal Compatibility】Supports wireless charging on Qi-Enabled devices like iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8, 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XR, pixel 3, Galaxy Note 10, Note 9, Note8, S10/S10+/S9/S9+, Galaxy S8 Plus, Galaxy S7/S7 Edge, Galaxy S6/S6 Edge, Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Lumia 920 and other Qi-Enabled devices.
【What You Get】 1 x Qi Fast wireless charger, 1 x 36w AC Fast charging adapter, 1 x User Manual, 1 x Portable Storage Box.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars145 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
